text: Beimen is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station code is G13. Taipei Main Station of the Taoyuan Airport MRT is also accessible from here. == Station layout information == The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Songshan and Platform 2 is for Xindian or Taipower Building. == Around the station == * Dadaocheng Wharf Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Beimen metro station
